eslintConfigComments.whySeparate: This needs to be a separate object from `eslintConfig` because eslint will refuse to run if there are any unknown properties in that object.
eslintConfigComments.root: Setting this to true is necessary to avoid merging WordCamp.org configs with any that exist in parent folders in the developer's environment. See https://github.com/eslint/eslint/commit/c99e9b621fe46b8535cf59fe489977dd36cb2a39.
